sentences: Meie planeedil kõigil on õigus vabadusele.
See tulemus oli imeline ja kõigile meeldis.
context: The word 'kõigil' is the allative case form of the pronoun 'kõik', meaning 'all' or 'everyone'. In Estonian, the allative case indicates movement toward something or someone. So 'kõigil' specifically means 'to everyone' or 'toward all of them' - it indicates that action is directed toward every person in a group.
